0.1.0.name: connect20/Mageboy_Outofstocknotification
0.1.0.description: Out Of Stock notification extensions  allow customers to enter their Email Id and notifies them once the stock is back to “In Stock” .

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
